name: Peanut Gallery
description:
A gallery of minigames designed to teach young children the importance of closing advertisements. Primarily designed for use on IOS and Android devices however in its current state it can be played on PC.

Peanut Gallery Team Dev blog: https://peanutgamedev.blogspot.com/

Peanut Gallery Programming Dev blog: https://peanutgalleryprogramming.blogspot.com/
